text.0_Introduction of the Author, 1_Paragrap: Here are my notes. Not sure how I got her, but I am here now.
text.4_Fourth Treatise on Trust, 1_, 0_Chapte: But the essence of "trust" is the emotional surety of the truster that her / his heart can depend upon the trustee to do what is good and correct for the truster--in the eyes of the trustee and according to the ability and knowledge of the trustee--to cause good for the truster.
